publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7116.2 Richard Baker: Administrative Justice and the Future of Tribunalsâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-7116) in the name of Kenny MacAskill, insert at end ", and, in doing so, recognises that any forthcoming proposals from the Scottish Government for reform of the tribunals system should be consulted on widely, including with those currently involved in the operation of tribunals, as well as trade unions, Citizens Advice Scotland and other organisations that support those taking cases to tribunals."
